positive.chat:
Hey! How are you doing today?
I'm great, thanks for asking!
That's awesome. Keep smiling!
You too! Let's catch up soon.
Absolutely, have a wonderful day!

negative.chat:
Nothing ever goes right for me.
I'm tired of all this.
Why does everything feel so hopeless?
I just want to give up.
No one understands how I feel.

toxic.chat:
If you talk to them again, we're done.
You belong to me and no one else.
Don't even think about leaving me.
I can't trust you anymore.
You make me so angry sometimes.

threatening.chat:
If you don't do what I say, you'll regret it.
This is your last warning.
Don't test my patience.
You better watch your back.
I know where you live.
